title: new handmade\_typography group
content:
new handmade\_typography group in flickR:

[http://www.flickr.com/groups/\_handmade\_typography/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170148/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/_handmade_typography/ "http://www.flickr.com/groups/\_handmade\_typography/")

have a look, enjoy and spread the news! :-)

 [‹ Heads up: Font Explorer users thinking of upgrading to OSX 10.5.2](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41992 "Go to previous forum topic") [type size for a magazine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41586 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Patrick Marc Sommer

comments.content: Nitpick: this group is celebrating lettering, not typography. Carry on.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ralf\_herrmann/340614650/in/pool-\_handmade\_t...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170148/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ralf_herrmann/340614650/in/pool-_handmade_typography "http://www.flickr.com/photos/ralf\_herrmann/340614650/in/pool-\_handmade\_typography")

i’m not one for ’this looks like this’ and ’this looks like that’, but, it’s painfully si scott
I like Si’s work a lot; but tired of seeing everyone else doing the same style these days with lettering.
